title: Star Hotel for Sale in Colombo
details:
Family Owned Star Hotel for Sale in Colombo city
Prime hotel located in the city for sale with 50 luxury Rooms and with all other facilities
On going hotel with a good will and business generated over the years by a well known management
Ideal investment opportunity and rare opportunity with a higher value appreciation and higher rate of return
Also right time to benefit from the booming tourism industry in the country
